name: DataRobot
description: DataRobot accelerates AI development with automated machine learning and deployment at scale.
about: DataRobot is an enterprise AI platform that democratizes data science and makes machine learning accessible to organizations. It automates the end-to-end process of building, deploying, and maintaining AI models. With MLOps capabilities and governance features, DataRobot helps organizations deploy AI at scale while maintaining control.

seo.metaDescription: DataRobot accelerates AI development with automated machine learning and deployment at scale.
